#summary Schedule of the Keyboard Layout Editor project
#labels Phase-Design
= Introduction =

Here we describe the rough schedule of the Keyboard Layout Editor project.

= Details =

  * Write antlr3 grammar to parse XKB files
  * Write program (based on antlr3) grammar that parses and outputs the same XKB file
  * Devise an XML schema to capture the data of a keyboard layout (desirable)
  * Enhance previous program to convert keyboard layouts into XML (desirable)
  * Create dummy UI for keyboard layout editor
